author: markt
msg: Use a PreparedStatement for the validation query to improve performance. Testing suggests a ~15% improvement with a very basic validation query.

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove several other uses of compile.optimize property.
The optimize flag is noop for current versions of javac (as Ant manual says).

author: markt
msg: Restore code that sets delegate to null otherwise PoolGuardConnectionWrapper can't do what it is meant to.

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove several other uses of compile.optimize property,
the optimize flag is noop for current versions of javac (as Ant manual says).
Provide explicit default for compile.deprecation property.
It controls whether -deprecation flag (a synonym for -Xlint:deprecation) is passed to javac.
No functional change here, as String->boolean conversion in Ant treats any value except of "on", "true", "yes" as false (Project.toBoolean()).

author: britter
msg: LANG-955: Add methods for removing all invalid characters according to XML 1.0 and XML 1.1 in an input string to StringEscapeUtils. Thanks to Adam Hooper
